ovdesc.p: This is a live file which is used for updating the aggregated balance.

desc.p: The id of this application will be COMPANY_ID.STATUS_TYPE.INDICIA.YEAR( Company id * Status Type * Indicia * Year).
The status type as in the ID.
The year to which the aggregated balance pertains to.
This field denotes the number of accounts under the above status type. The Count will be by number of clients.
The aggregated balance for the accounts under this classification.
The GIIN of the non-participating financial institution updated from FATCA TAX BASE.
The field will be Update from FATCA.TAX.BASE record.
This will be mapped from the LOCAL COUNTRY field of the COMPANY to which the ACCOUNT belongs to.
This fields will be Update from FATCA.TAX.BASE record.
If the STATUS in FATCA PARAMETER is IGA1, then the receiving country will be the same as the TransmittingCountry else it will be ‘US’.
The field will be updated as FATCA.POOL.BALANCE.ID.SEQ.NO (seq.no will be 1 for the new record).
The field is used for updating the amended message reference.
This fields will be Update from FATCA.TAX.BASE record.
Date on which the base file is updated
Time of the request for generating xml will be updated.
The field will be updated from the field COMPANY.NAME in COMPANY record.
This is a multi-value field which will be updated from the field NAME.ADDRESS in COMPANY record.
The field will be updated from the field EIN in FATCA.PARAMETER record.
On Authorising the FATCA.XML.REQUEST the field will be updated as
FATCA1 = New
FATCA2 = Corrected
FATCA3 = Void
FATCA4 = Amended
Based on the FATCA.TAX.BASE STATUS.TYPE AND INDICAT STATUS FIELD Below will be updated .
FATCA201 = Recalcitrant account holders with US Indicia
FATCA202 = Recalcitrant account holders without US Indicia
FATCA203 = Dormant Accounts
FATCA204 = Non-participating foreign financial institutions
